name: Meliodas: Important Things
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have another 《Britannia》 character, this card gets +1 level and +1500 power until end of turn.
【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, choose 1 of your other 《Britannia》 characters, 【REST】 it, and move it to an open position of your back stage.
flavor_text: Hey! I almost forgot about something really important.

name: Elizabeth: Druid Priestess
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have another 《Britannia》 character, this card gets +1500 power.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When this card attacks, if "Incredible Power" is in your climax area, and you have another 《Britannia》 character, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room, choose up to 1 level X or lower 《Britannia》 character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand. X is equal to the total level of the cards put into your waiting room by this effect. (Climax are regarded as level 0)
flavor_text: Hendrickson: "It appears the blood flowing through a Druid priestess’s veins has awakened."

name: Meliodas: To the Rescue
ability: 【CONT】 If all of your characters are 《Britannia》, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 【CXCOMBO】 When "Full Counter" is placed on your climax area, if you have 4 or more other 《Britannia》 characters, this card gets +1000 power and the following ability until the end of your opponent's next turn. "【AUTO】 [(1)] When the character facing this card attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal 2 damage to your opponent." (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: You guys should be ashamed of yourselves. A buncha men ganging up on a girl like this...

name: Arthur: Confident
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, look at up to 2 cards from the top of your deck, choose 1 card from among them, put it on the top of your deck, and put the rest into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if you have 1 or less other characters, you may put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a level 0 or lower character, put it on any position of your back stage.
flavor_text: I refuse!

name: Meliodas: Hypnotized
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is in your stage, this card gets 《Holy Knight》.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 《Britannia》 character from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: Hawk: "You know that is Diane, right?"

name: Hawk: Passion for Scraps
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put the top card of your deck into your clock] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose 1 level 1 or lower character in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Well, he’s not getting my scraps, that’s for sure.

name: Elizabeth: Breaking the Spell
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose this card and 1 of your 《Britannia》 characters, and exchange them as 【STAND】.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if the level of this card's battle opponent is higher than your opponent's level, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put the bottom card of your opponent's stock into their waiting room.
flavor_text: Ruin: "That’s what you were after the whole time!"

name: Elizabeth: Sacrificing Herself
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "Meliodas: To the Rescue" get +1000 power and the following 2 abilities. "【CONT】 This card cannot be chosen by your opponent's effects." "【CONT】 During this card's battle, you cannot receive damage by 【AUTO】 effects of your opponent's characters."
【CONT】 Assist All of your level 3 or higher characters in front of this card get +2000 power.
flavor_text: For once, let me protect you instead.

name: Meliodas: Ultimate Blow
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other 《Britannia》 characters.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, search your deck for up to 1 《Britannia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 [Put 2 cards from your hand into your waiting room] During this card's battle, when the damage you received is not canceled, and you have 2 or more other 《Britannia》 characters, you may pay the cost. If you do, deal the same damage to your opponent. (Damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Revenge Counter!

name: Elizabeth: Courage and Determination
ability: 【CONT】 If this card is in the middle position of your center stage, this card gets +1 soul.

【AUTO】 [(1) Put 1 card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to 1 《Britannia》 character, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: I gave my word to you.

name: Elizabeth: Instant Answer
ability: 【CONT】 All of your opponent's characters get "【AUTO】 Encore [(2)]".
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may choose 1 card in your hand, and put it into your stock.
flavor_text:
Meliodas: "You wanna come?"
Elizabeth: "Yes!"

name: Meliodas: Unrepentant
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, if you have 2 or more other 《Britannia》 characters, this card gets +2000 power.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your other 《Britannia》 characters, and that character gets +2000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: I needed seed money for the tavern.

name: Arthur: Provoking the Enemy
ability: 【CONT】 If you have 2 or more other 《Britannia》 characters, this card gets +1500 power and "【AUTO】 Encore [Put 1 character from your hand into your waiting room]".

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if you have 4 or more other 《Britannia》 characters, you may choose 1 《Britannia》 character in your waiting room, and put it into your stock.
flavor_text: Why don't you try harder to draw it out of me?

name: Elizabeth: New Dress
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When you use this card's "Backup", you may pay the cost. If you do, return all cards from your waiting room to your deck, and shuffle your deck.

【ACT】 【COUNTER】 Backup 2500, Level 2 [(1) Put this card from your hand into your waiting room] (Choose 1 of your characters that is being frontal attacked, and that character gets +2500 power until end of turn)

name: Hawk: Confusion
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2) 【REST】 1 of your 【STAND】 《Britannia》 characters] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses 1 climax in their waiting room, returns all cards from their waiting room except that card to their deck, and shuffles their deck.
flavor_text:
Ban: "What the hell are you doing up there?"
Hawk: "You tell me!"

name: Elizabeth: Options for Disguise
ability: 【CONT】 If your waiting room has 2 or less climax, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.

【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, look at up to X cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of 《Britannia》 characters you have.

name: Hawk: Mode of Transportation
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.

【ACT】 [【REST】 2 of your characters] Choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets the following ability until end of turn. "【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may put the top card of your deck into your stock."
flavor_text: Aww man, what am I, your hambulance...?

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose 1 of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.

【ACT】 [(1) Put this card into your waiting room] Look at up to 4 cards from the top of your deck, choose up to 1 《Britannia》 character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Meliodas: Reunion
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another "Ban: Reunion", this card gets +3000 power.

ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +1500 power until end of turn.
